data.title: Storia della Musica - vol. I by Franco Abbiati: ottimo Rilegato (1941)
data.meta_description: Rilegato - Garzanti - 1941 - Condition: ottimo - Storia della musica, primo volume dall'antica Roma al Rinascimento. Volume rilegato in ottime condizioni. - Storia della Musica - vol. I
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

We guarantee the condition of every book as it's described on the Abebooks web

sites. If you're dissatisfied with your purchase (Incorrect Book/Not as

Described/Damaged) or if the order hasn't arrived, you're eligible for a refund

within 30 days of the estimated delivery date. If you've changed your mind about

a book that you've ordered, please use the Ask bookseller a question link to

contact us and we'll respond within 2 business days.

Shipping Terms:

Per i pagamenti in CONTRASSEGNO calcolare un costo aggiuntivo di 3¿ alle spese di spedizione già indicate.

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
